item.content:encoded:
Price: $33.99 - $14.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:40:18 UTC – Details)



Fiskars Non-stick Micro-Tip Pruning Snips feature precise blades that cut all the way to the tip for clean, healthy cuts on plants in tight spaces
Non-stick blade coating helps reduce jamming and resin build-up when cutting through sticky plants
Awarded the Arthritis Foundation’s ease of use commendation for a design that’s ideal for those with arthritis or limited hand strength
Fully hardened, precision-ground steel blades stay sharp longer
Easy Action spring gently opens blades after each cut to help reduce hand fatigue
SoftGrip touchpoints enhance comfort and control
Easy-open lock protects blades during transport and storage
Full lifetime warranty

4.5
Price: $33.99 - $14.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:40:18 UTC – Details)

Price: $255.54 - $169.90
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:34:01 UTC – Details)


The Caséta wireless Deluxe dimmer kit with Caséta Smart Hub provides simple and personalized control of your lights, shades and temperature. Control your lights from anywhere within your home with the included Pico remote controls or from anywhere in the world using the free Lutron app. Set lights to automatically adjust with spring and fall time changes, create personalized schedules to turn on, off, or dim lights at set times to best fit your everyday routines, or control lights with your voice via Alexa and Siri. The Caséta Smart Hub also connects with other leading brands like Ring, Honeywell, Sonos, Serena shades and more. The included in-wall dimmers install easily with no neutral wire required, provide the best dimming performance for over 500 different dimmable LED bulbs, and can be controlled from anywhere within the home with the included Pico remotes. To use dimmers in a multi-location application, replace the existing switch with a Pico remote control and wall plate adapter (PICO-WBX-ADAPT, sold separately). Pico remote control takes (1) CR2032 battery, included in remote.
PEACE OF MIND: Set lights to automatically adjust with changing seasons so your family always comes back to a well-lit home; you can also enable the Smart Away feature to randomly turn your lights on and off to look like you’re home even if you’re away.
MOST CONNECTED: Caséta connects with more leading smart home devices – including Alexa, Apple HomeKit, the Google Assistant, Serena shades and Sonos – than any other smart lighting control brand
CONTROL YOUR WAY: Caséta puts the smarts in the switch so you can control your lights a variety of ways – via the free Lutron app, your voice, or from the wall. You can create personalized schedules to turn on, off, or dim lights at set times to best fit your everyday routines, or activate favorite lighting scenes with the touch of a button
RELIABLY SMART: The Caséta Smart Hub doesn’t use Wi-Fi, so you get super-fast, ultra-reliable smart lighting that works right, without slowing your Wi-Fi down with more devices
SET IT AND FORGET IT: Always keep your smart light functionality. Even when the Wi-Fi goes down, there’s no need to reset your schedules and scenes or reconnect everything when it comes back online
GET MORE, SPEND LESS: One Caséta smart switch can control many bulbs at once; make many bulbs smart, even your existing bulbs get smart control of multiple styles of dimmable LED, incandescent, and halogen bulbs
WORKS WITH EXISTING WIRING: Unlike other smart dimmer switches, Caséta works in any home, of any age, as it does not require a neutral wire



Previous page

Next page

1 Wall Control 2 App Control 3 Voice Control 4 Pico Remote Control

Previous page

  1. Smart Hub

    Unlock smart features that enhance your system.

  2. Most Compatible

    Caséta works with more smart home products than any other smart lighting brand.

  3. Scheduling

    Schedule your lights to come on at dusk and have them automatically adjust as the seasons change.

  4. Geofencing

    Set your location around your home so your lights automatically turn on as you arrive home.

  5. Smart Away

    Use Smart Away to randomly turn your lights on or off to give the illusion that you are home.

Next page

1 Smart Hub 2 Most Compatible 3 Scheduling 4 Geofencing 5 Smart Away

Create Personalized Scenes and Schedules


Good Morning

Create personalized schedules for the way you live: for example, schedule kitchen lights to turn on to a soft level every morning at 6:30 (except weekends!).


Dinner with Friends

Control multiple lights at the same time by setting a scene. Save your favorites and activate them with a single touch, so you’ll always have the right light for the moment.

Two Dimmer Starter Kit

item.title: Gorilla Supply 1000 Dog Poop Waste Bags with Dispenser and Leash Tie, Eco-friendly, Leak-Proof, Water-Proof, Durable and Strong, Unscented, EPI technology, BPA free, 9X13inch, 1000 Count
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) 🌏 REAL ZERO WASTE: Gorilla poop bags only take 12-36 months to begin breaking down under sunlight by EPI technology and are ASTM D6954 certified. Additionally, we created true Zero Waste through coreless rolls and recyclable packaging. We strive for a better environment for you and your dog to live ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $18.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:21:22 UTC – Details)



REAL ZERO WASTE: Gorilla poop bags only take 12-36 months to begin breaking down under sunlight by EPI technology and are ASTM D6954 certified. Additionally, we created true Zero Waste through coreless rolls and recyclable packaging. We strive for a better environment for you and your dog to live in.
LEAKPROOF & DURABLE: Our extra thick and sturdy unscented poop bags are strong enough to pick up your dog’s poop without the risk of tearing. Keep your hands clean and away from bad smells with 100% waterproof materials. Our bags are designed to lock away odors and guarantee a mess-free leakproof seal.
RELIABLE US COMPANY: We are an Illinois based small business that loves doggies. Customer satisfaction is always our first priority, and the customer trust we have built up over the years will prove this. We continue to strive to provide the best quality at an affordable price. Don’t hesitate to send us your feedback by message.
SUPER VALUE PACK: Great price for 1000 count poop bags (50 rolls with 20 bags per roll) with 1 bone shaped patented dispenser. A value package is sufficient for more than a year’s use. Our pet waste bag is designed for your convenience. Each large pet waste bag measures 9 X 13 inches, that is enough capacity for all sizes dogs and cats. SAVE UP TO 10% with Subscribe & Save.

4.5
Price: $18.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:21:22 UTC – Details)

This multipurpose dermaplaning tool and face razor expertly shapes eyebrows, easily removes ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $5.67
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:15:51 UTC – Details)


Look your best at a moment’s notice! Whether you’re looking for an eyebrow razor, face shaver, or peach fuzz remover, our Schick Hydro Silk Touch-Up is a great all-in-one option that’s the perfect addition to your beauty routine. This multipurpose dermaplaning tool and face razor expertly shapes eyebrows, easily removes fine hairs by dermaplaning, and gently exfoliates and smooths your skin. Its blade is designed with fine micro-guards to help protect your skin, and it comes with an added precision cover for precise eyebrow shaping. It also makes a great travel razor, for fine-tuning on the go.
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 0.43 x 3.15 x 7.95 inches; 0.96 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 10841058001178
UPC ‏ : ‎ 841058001171
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Edgewell Personal Care
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0787GLBMV
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ USA
Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues. International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More

Create Beautiful Brows – Includes a precision cover for precise eyebrow shaping.
High-Quality Blades – Dermaplaning tool uniquely designed with fine micro-guards to help protect your skin from nicks and irritation.
Anytime, Anywhere – Slim, portable-sized travel razor lets you take it wherever you go, so you’re always ready for a last-minute touch-up.
Convenience – Hydro Silk Touch-Up tools can be recycled using our mail back program.
Schick Hydro Silk Touch-Up Exfoliating Dermaplaning Tool Pack includes 3 disposable razors + 1 precision cover.

Read more

Look your best at a moment’s notice! Schick Hydro Silk Touch-Up razors quickly shape eyebrows and easily remove fine hairs. You can even gently exfoliate and smooth your skin. The high-quality blades feature fine microguards to help protect skin. The set includes 3 razors and 1 Precision Cover for precise eyebrow shaping.

Read more

Features and Benefits

Expertly Shapes Eyebrows

Easily style eyebrows and carefully touch-up stray hairs with the Precision Cover—an extra attachment included with purchase.

Smoothes and Exfoliates

Gently exfoliates, leaving skin feeling soft and smooth.

Comfortably Removes Fine Hairs

High-quality blade is uniquely designed with fine microguards to help protect your skin.

Free Yourself from Unwanted Hair

No need to worry that shaving might cause hair to grow back thicker—it’s simply untrue. With Schick Silk Touch-Up, you can comfortably remove unwanted hair from your face.

Read more

Your vehicle takes a beating from harmful elements like UV and oxidation. Original Protectant Wipes deliver proven Armor All protection and shine — all with the convenience of a disposable wipe. We meticulously engineered a wipe that delivers extraordinary results — good enough for the most discerning detailers and show car owners. 100% satisfaction of your money back. Armor All absolutely guarantees its products will meet or exceed your highest standards.
One 30 count canister of Armor All Original Formula Car Protectant Wipes
A convenient wipe with the proven protection of Armor All Original Protectant
Safely cleans automotive interiors, including vinyl, plastic and rubber
Protects against UV damage to prevent cracking and fading
Adds shine to restore the rich, deep look of your dashboard, console, door panels and vinyl seats
Non-greasy and lint-free for a truly exceptional clean

Read more

It Couldn’t Be Simpler to Renew & Maintain Your Interior

Keep these wipes in your car to maintain your interior’s deep, rich look and add beautiful shine.

Apply our high-shine protectants to your car’s interior to keep your vehicle looking cleaner, longer.

Help prevent cracking, fading, discoloration, and premature aging with a variety of pleasing scents.

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:25:15 UTC – Details)


The strand features 20 icicles with 100 total LED lights. The 10 long icicles have 6 lights and the 10 short ones have 4. It allows you to vary your eye-catching Christmas lights display to keep you excited and your guests dazzled.
FUNCTION & TIMER: Combination, In Wave, Sequential, Slow-glow, Chasing/flash, Slow fade, Twinkle/flash, Steady on total 8 modes. Build in timer and memory function let the icicle lights automatically turn on and off (6hrs on, 18hrs off) and no need to reset every day.
Christmas Decor Dimension: These static lights are mains operated with a discreet clear cable at a total length of approximately 16 ft, and with 1 ft between each bulb. Long ice cone: 12”, short ice cone: 8”. End-to-end plugs let you connect up to 4 strings together.
Wide Applications: The Christmas icicle lights features a realistic look with durable material. Decor it on your gutters, roof lines, fences, porch railings, garages or trees to create the ideal festive front or back garden.
Ideal Christmas Gift: Turn your home into a winter wonderland with these Christmas dripping icicle Lights. Celebrate the season with an eye-catching holiday display when you decorate with classic clear or festive cool white Christmas lights!

Price: $36.99 - $34.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:25:15 UTC – Details)

FOR ALL PUPS AND POOPS: Extra long, extra strong bags to accommodate any size poop. These bags are designed to fit our dispenser, or any standard sized dispenser like a glove.
MORE BAGS, MORE WAGS: 270 poop bags (18 rolls x 15 bags each) to keep all your dispensers (pockets, tote bags, drawers, and car glove compartment) full.
GIVING BACK SINCE 2009: Your purchase from Earth Rated helps support animal shelters, rescues & non-profit organizations. As a B Corporation, making things better, for dogs and people, is the reason we’re excited to come to work each day.
OFTEN IMITATED, NEVER POOP-LICATED: Official Earth Rated dispenser made to fit our rolls of 9″x13″ poop bags in both lavender scented and unscented. Perfect for small, medium and large dogs.

item.title: SIMPLUT Toothpaste Tablet with Fluoride – Camping Travel Hiking Backpacking – Vegan Natural Ingredient – White Teeth, Fresh Breath (Peppermint) (60 Count (Pack of 1))
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Product Description Freshen Your Breath Wherever You Go Bringing tubes of toothpaste when you travel can be a hassle. Needing to put them into clear zipper bags for airport security? Or how about those tubes being squished and exploding all over your luggage. Either way, a day spent being hassled ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $13.98
(as of Nov 29,2022 03:37:49 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Freshen Your Breath Wherever You Go

Bringing tubes of toothpaste when you travel can be a hassle. Needing to put them into clear zipper bags for airport security? Or how about those tubes being squished and exploding all over your luggage.

Either way, a day spent being hassled by screening officers or washing off exploded dried toothpaste from your clothes is surely not how you intend to travel. With SIMPLUT’s toothpaste tablets, you can travel freely and have fresh breath and clean teeth no matter where you are in the world.

Exceptional Dental Care Without Harsh Chemicals

We think of toothpaste as great for the teeth. And they are—aside from the many out there that contain chemicals harmful to our health and well-being in the long run.

Our toothpaste tablets taste good and are naturally flavored with Xylitol, sage, and green tea extracts. Paraben-free, these tabs also contain Vitamins B6, E, C, and fluoride for better dental health.

Sustainable Oral Care Solution

Making the switch to zero-waste living or just wanting to try out a product that’ll redefine the way you use toothpaste? 100% plastic-free, SIMPLUT Toothpaste Tablets come in a tin case that lets you get the most out of portable toothpaste. Take one tablet, chew, and brush. No more squeezing that last bit of toothpaste from a tube.

keep your teeth healthy With Chewable Toothpaste

Keep your teeth healthy and away from plaque and cavities while keeping your breath fresh. SIMPLUT Toothpaste Tablets contain fluoride to strengthen tooth enamel. Other toothpaste tablets don’t contain fluoride, which means that your teeth aren’t getting the protection they need to stay healthy.

Suitable for Vegans Too

SIMPLUT Toothpaste Tablets are made only with plant-based ingredients. These peppermint-flavored tablets do not contain any raw animal substances and are never tested on animals. Gluten-free, SIMPLUT toothpaste is also recognized by “Wasteless Design”, a certification given to products that reduce your carbon footprint through plastic-free packaging.

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 2.95 x 2.87 x 1.18 inches; 2.4 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ sl001
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ May 6, 2019
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ SIMPLUT
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07RLNKLP8

EASY TO USE: The mouthwash tablets are incredibly easy to use. Take a tablet or two, chew it a few times, and brush away! The micro particles will clean your teeth, and whiten your teeth.
MINIMAL CHEMICAL USE: Our flavored toothpaste tablets contain Vitamins B6, E, C, Xylitol, aloe extract and fluoride, without any parabens or sulphates. These tablets provide best possible dental care while using the least amount of chemicals possible.

Read more

Read more
